name: mr_pete
text: This is the closest thing I have yet seen to classic laffs-in-the-last-panel comic here.

text: Hehe, Bill Callahan is also a supremely bummed out indie folk singer

text: You son of a bitch. You son of a bitch, you beat me to a Smog joke by six entire months, basically.

text: That comment works quite well with your avatar

text: yours... does not

text: TOO

name: gunsofray
text: says the guy with the (talking?) potato avatar

name: i_love_kate
text: Bill Callahan is the lucky son-of-a-bitch who's dating Joanna Newsom.

name: sweetlips
text: Not any more, friend! She's now dating that Andy Sanberg or whatever from SNL.

name: i_love_kate
text: Clearly I've been neglecting my Newsom-stalkage. I'm sorry Joanna. You can still expect your anonymous Christmas present. Though secretly you will know who it is from.

name: tekende
text: Why would anyone want to date her? I can only imagine the horrible noises she must make during coitus.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Says the guy who's all about Tori fucking Amos.

name: tekende
text: Tori Amos has a much, much, much, much better singing voice than Joanna Newsom. Tori Amos does not give me a headache with her music. Tori Amos is also much better looking than Joanna Newsom.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I'm not going to bother getting into this kind of argument (I think I already have, once, on assetbar?), but I'm just going to say that the little high pitch vocal thing Tori Amos does on "Crucify" (ooh, she's a minister's daughter and she wrote a song with the words "Crucify myself!") makes me want to step hard on cats, you know, grinding the heal in some shit-kicker boots and everything, because that would probably makes Tori Amos really angry somehow and that's the only way I could get back at her.

Also, I don't listen to music because the maker is pretty.

To each his own, I suppose.

name: anticitizen
text: i can hang with a dude who a.) makes Smog jokes and b.) is so damn fiery about it.

name: anabanananana
text: Bill Callahan is also a really bad football coach.

name: epicurus
text: When I was five I would have paid a lot of money that I did not have for this call.

text: Proof that trawling the archive provides forgotten one-shot gems.

text: Alt text: what are you wearing right now / my police uniform and cop hat

text: Oh, man.  Place this ad in your local paper.  Replace the phone number with the local police station number.  Hilarity ensues.  (until you are arrested)

text: Anyone dialed this number yet?

text: No. But I'm about to!

name: catgrl131
text:
Well, it's been two months.
How'd it go?

text: Meh.

name: catgrl131
text:
What do you mean? Did you gat to chat with a cop? Did you even get an answer?
DETAILS, PEOPLE!

name: bjorntd
text: YOU WOULDN'T UNDERSTAND THE RELATIONSHIP OFFICER VASQUEZ AND I HAVE.

text: Officer Vasquez would not wear a police hat in the shower! Applesauce!

name: sje46
text: Lame.

name: random_shorts
text: Is there anything that is NOT lame to you, sje46? I postulate that the answer is, in fact, no.

name: sje46
text: wallabee went on a laming spree, right down assetbar,  two months ago, so I lamed a bunch of his comments.

name: random_shorts
text:
Completely logical. Teaches me to open my mouth.

I didn't even notice it was all directed at the same person.
